description:
Rei locks himself in a house alone to await his final moments, not wanting his miserable death to be seen by others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dainibu Kanketsu: Saraba Rei! Jidai wa Yuusha no Densetsu o Kataritsugu
End of Part Two: Farewell, Rei! Heroic Legend Will Be Told Throughout the Ages!
第2部完結 さらばレイ! 時代は勇者の伝説を語り継ぐ
